yo i want you all to understand i come from south philly and when i walk the street is like a pharmacy they got all type of shit anybody could get  it goes from h to ex to lucy ciggarette for my ghetto legend known from lil shyst running  cop codeine by the courts and keep comin dummy just embracing the dope like its a woman you burnin both sides of the rope and keep pullin tuggin in between islam and straight tuggin  laying everyday around the way and doin nothin seeem looking shaking their head and start shruggin if they dont have a man like mine they got a cousin hey yo you better be a true friend to em  before the shit put an end to em or give a pen to em or lockem up in the studio with a mic cause on the real it might save his life keep tellinem
